submission:
class Solution:
    def maximumValueSum(self, board: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        m, n = len(board), len(board[0])
        # ans = float('-inf')
        ans = board[0][0] + board[1][1] + board[2][2]
        # def f(
        #     p: # 第几个
        #     d_i: # 不能选的行
        #     d_j: # 不能选的列
        #     v: # 之前的价值
        # ):
        arr = []
        for i in range(m):
            for j in range(n):
                arr.append([board[i][j], i, j])
        arr.sort(key=lambda x: -x[0])
        # print(arr, end='\n\n')
        an = len(arr)
        for i in range(an - 2):
            v1, i1, j1 = arr[i]
            # print(arr[i])
            t = arr[i][0]
            if t + arr[i + 1][0] + arr[i + 2][0] <= ans:
                # print('q')
                return ans
            d_i = defaultdict(int)
            d_j = defaultdict(int)
            d_i[arr[i][1]] += 1
            d_j[arr[i][2]] += 1
            for j in range(i + 1, an - 1):
                v2, i2, j2 = arr[j]
                if t + v2 + arr[j + 1][0] <= ans:
                    # print('w')
                    break
                if d_i[i2] > 0 or d_j[j2] > 0:
                    continue
                t += v2
                d_i[i2] += 1
                d_j[j2] += 1
                for k in range(j + 1, an):
                    v3, i3, j3 = arr[k]
                    if t + v3 <= ans:
                        # print('e')
                        # return ans
                        break
                    if d_i[i3] > 0 or d_j[j3] > 0:
                        continue
                    # print(d_i)
                    # print(d_j)
                    # print((i3, j3, v3), t + v3, ans)
                    # if t + v3 > ans:
                    # print((i1, j1), (i2, j2), (i3, j3), t + v3)
                    ans = max(ans, t + v3)
                    break
                t -= v2
                d_i[i2] -= 1
                d_j[j2] -= 1
        return ans
